title: Animated Open World Survival Tools
description: AAA quality Open World Survival Tools Pack with flashlight, hammer, pickaxe and more in 2K-4K textures.
longDescription:
The Ironbelly Open World Survival Tools Pack has photorealistic items needed for any project where things might get dirty. Made in stunning 2K-4K textures, these items can be used for modern, western or dystopian projects alike. Including a flashlight, hammer, iron hoe & shovel and torch, you can be mining for gold or burying the evidence. Take your pick and grab a pickaxe!


https://youtu.be/EI9d1oAJ5Jg
technicalDetails:
84 Total Assets

First Person Arms

(1) Ultra High AAA Quality First Person Arms (12,120 Tris / 6,094 Verts)

(1) First Person Arms LOD (50% - 6,060 Tris / 3,063 Verts)

(1) First Person Arms Skeletal Rig (70 bones)

(5) PBR Textures @ 4096x4096 (Base Color, Metalness, Roughness, Normal Map, Ambient Occlusion)


Tools

(1) Flashlight (1,040 Tris / 734 Verts)

(1) Flashlight Rig (1 bone)

(2) Flashlight LODs

(3) PBR Textures @ 4096x4096 (Base Color, Normal Map, RMA)

(5) Idle, Walk, Run, Raise, Lower animations with FP arms


(1) Hammer (1,302 Tris / 975 Verts)

(1) Hammer Rig (1 bone)

(2) Hammer LODs

(3) PBR Textures @ 4096x4096 (Base Color, Normal Map, RMA)

(6) Idle, Walk, Run, Raise, Lower, Hit animations with FP arms


(1) Iron Hoe (750 Tris / 631 Verts)

(1) Iron Hoe Rig (2 bones)

(2) Iron Hoe LODs

(3) PBR Textures @ 2048x2048 (Base Color, Normal Map, RMA)

(7) Idle, Walk, Run, Raise, Lower, Chop, Dig animations with FP arms


(1) Iron Shovel (526 Tris / 438 Verts)

(1) Iron Shovel Rig (2 bones)

(2) Iron Shovel LODs

(3) PBR Textures @ 2048x2048 (Base Color, Normal Map, RMA)

(6) Idle, Walk, Run, Raise, Lower, Chop animations with FP arms


(1) Pickaxe (1488 Tris / 1195 Verts)

(1) Pickaxe Rig (2 bones)

(2) Pickaxe LODs

(3) PBR Textures @ 4096x4096 (Base Color, Normal Map, RMA)

(6) Idle, Walk, Run, Raise, Lower, Hit animations with FP arms
